channel.title: Make aggrasive or attacking NPC's
channel.description:
yo, i've been creating my own private server, using doomscape v1.1 or 1.2 source, but my NPC´s only try to dmg me once, so i want to make them aggrasive or at last make them attack me. the server is quite difrent than the cheezscape based servers imo, becouse i already saw somewhere how to do it on a cheezscape based, but that didn´t work.
if you would like to take a look at my server, go to http://vayle.tk to see my server. (you shall need to download it first). that is V1.1 for now, i gonna upload V1.2 once i fixed the NPC attack bug.
i hope someone can help me, ty already.

item.title: Make aggrasive or attacking NPC's
item.dc:creator: @vayle vayle
item.description:
@vayle wrote:

soz, but it doesn’t seem to work becouse i cant find it, and if i put it in (where i’ve tried, am still bussy with it,

it doesn’t work yet. but if i find the solution i will post it of course

Read full topic

item.title: Make aggrasive or attacking NPC's
item.dc:creator: @str_o_tek str o tek
item.description:
@str_o_tek wrote:

in NPCHandler.java look for
public void annoyNpcs
you should see a bunch of cases near that jsut go down a little bit
here a example
Code:

public int getDistanceForNpc(int Npc) {
switch(npcs[Npc].npcType) {
case 50:
case 1115:
case 1155:
case 1160:
case 2627:
case 2630:
case 2631:
case 2738:
case 2741:
case 2743:
case 2745:
case 1472:

than just add the npc you want like npc 1 would be case 1:

lol, i just found it in google, first one i got. u shud have googled it

Read full topic
